long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our Full-Page Screenshot Capture Extension offers a solution to the tedious process of capturing multiple screenshots of long webpages. No more scrolling and taking multiple screenshots or using the print screen button and editing later. With our extension, you can capture an entire webpage, including scrolling pages, with a single click!

The extension uses a cloud-based screenshot service to render the whole webpage and return a full-page screenshot. It supports both desktop and mobile views, so you can get the screenshot as it would appear on a variety of devices.

Key Features:

Full-Page Screenshots: Capture the entire content of a webpage, even those with long content that requires scrolling, in one single image.
Desktop and Mobile Views: Choose whether to capture the screenshot as it would appear on a desktop browser or a mobile device.
Automatic Downloads: Screenshots are automatically downloaded to your default download folder, saving you the hassle of manually saving images.
Simple to Use: Just input the URL or use the auto-detect feature, select the device view, and click capture - it's that simple!
How to Use:

Install the Extension: Add the Full-Page Screenshot Capture Extension to your browser.
Navigate to the Page or Input URL: You can either navigate to the webpage you want to capture and click the extension icon, or manually input the URL into the extension popup.
Select Device View (Optional): Choose whether to capture the screenshot in 'desktop' or 'mobile' view.
Click Capture: Click the 'Capture' button and wait for a few seconds as the extension captures the full-page screenshot and automatically downloads it to your device.
Simplify your screenshot process and enhance productivity with our Full-Page Screenshot Capture Extension. Try it today!
